description: PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada is issuing this request for standing offer...
full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer: Kosher Meals**
=====================================================

**Request Number:** WS4443903416
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-07 at 14:00:00 Eastern Time (ET)

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada, invites suppliers to submit a standing offer for the provision of Kosher Meals. This procurement aims to acquire minimally processed meat and poultry products.

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Key Details**
----------------

* **Catergory:** Minimally processed meat and poultry products (UNSPSC Code: *50111500)
* **Region:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Estimated Contract Value:** None
* **Anticipated Contract Duration:** None

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

Suppliers must submit their offer through the Government of Canada's Bid Portal. The contract award will be made based on the lowest price submitted by the supplier.

For more information and to access the request for standing offer, please visit the [Bid Portal](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19319879?extsite=MTkzMTk4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any questions or concerns regarding this procurement, please contact Renee-Ann Therien at renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.659.  NOTE: You have exceeded the character limit for the REPLY PREAMBLE.  Please shorten your response to 400 characters or less.
